__TOC__



This week's Hug Day will focus on '''Firefox 3'''! 

After you have triaged or fixed a bug put your name in the last column and set the row's background to green by adding '''lightgreen''' in the first cell of the column after '''rowbgcolor='''.  This will let people know that the bug in that row has been hugged.

=== 5-a-day-ing ===
During hug days you can also do <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/5-A-Day|5-A-Day]]</nowiki> for this one you can do the following in order to tag your work on the hug day:

* 5-a-day --add-tag hugday-20090122
* Add bugs to 5-a-day as usual
* And when done with hug day run: 5-a-day --remove-tag hugday-20090122

=== Triage Process ===

The <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MozillaTeam|Mozilla Team]]</nowiki> has a NEW/Incomplete processing described at their <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MozillaTeam/Bugs/TriagersHandbook|Triagers Handbook]]</nowiki>, Please read that information before starting to doing some triage.
 
=== Stock Responses ===

Firefox 3 stock response for collecting more information:

<pre>
Thanks for taking the time to report this bug and helping to make Ubuntu better. Could you please add more information for it by looking to https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MozillaTeam/Bugs , Thanks in advance.
</pre>

For general stock responses please see <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Bugs/Responses|Bugs/Responses]]</nowiki>.
